game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the mischievous raccoons.
game.description: Your grandmother's favorite necklace has been pilfered by a group of sneaky raccoons. She is heartbroken and needs you to retrieve it for her.
game.reward: A Golden Acorn, which grants +10% experience points in Herbology.

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the raccoons' underground lair. It's hidden behind a waterfall in the Whispering Woods.
tasks.location: Whispering Woods, near the Old Oak Tree

tasks.description: Confront the ring leader of the raccoons and retrieve your grandmother's heirloom. Be prepared for a fight!
tasks.location: The Raccoon Hideout, Deep within Whispering Woods

tasks.objective: Return the necklace to Grandma Whiskers
tasks.description: Bring the recovered necklace back to your grandmother and receive your reward.
tasks.location: Grandma's Cottage, in the Heartwood Village
